Pamela Stretton (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1980) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke ọrụ ya na-emetụta ahụ nwanyị na ịma mma ya, na ọrụ ya na omenala a ma ama. Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ ihe odide ink jet dijitalụ nke jikọtara foto na ederede; ha bụ ihe mejupụtara koodu, akara, na mgbasa ozi nke na-emepụta onyinyo buru ibu nke ụdị nwanyị

Eserese ndị ahụ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, mana ha na-enwekwa isiokwu gbasara ọdịbendị a ma ama, ejiji, ahụike, na nri. Ihe omuma nke ihe omuma nke abuo bu ihe omuma na-arutu aka na nsogbu iri nri. N'otu aka ahụ, usoro grid na-egosi nrụgide nke nkwekọrịta. A na-akpọ ụdị ya ụdị nwanyị nke Chuck Close.
Stretton nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Art (nke nwere ọdịiche) na Mahadum Rhodes n'afọ 2002 nakwa Master of Fine Art ya (nke nwere ịdị iche) na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2005.
